channel.title: Having a Problem Connecting to a server im hosting on the internet
channel.description: I have done everything correctly to run a server that i downloaded the problem i have is that i cant route people to my ip becase the neighbor lets me use his wirless and his firewall settings are locked so i cant make it so people go to my ip becase there going to his ip so therefore i cant run my server online, only on lan. if there is a genious out there maybe you can help me out please also on the server i am trying to get into the quest bar area and type information about the server like admins and owners and mods if anyone knows how to do that it would be great if you could help. Or is there no way possible and i have to go buy my own internet

im trying my best to figure it out i can understand the more difficult parts just not the easy stuff lol make sence/
